hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo su - root << EOF cd /root if [ -d /root/check_pkg_install_uninstall_function_service ]; then rm -rf /root/check_pkg_install_uninstall_function_service fi git clone https://gitee.com/angela7/check_pkg_install_uninstall_function_service.git cd check_pkg_install_uninstall_function_service
> pkglist cat > ./pkglist << FEOF1 asciidoc at augeas autoconf autogen FEOF1
BRANCH="openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP1" ARCH="x86_64" UPDATE_TIME="20210630" EPOL="0" PRE_PATH=$(pwd)
# oscrc mkdir -p /root/.config/osc > /root/.config/osc/oscrc cat > /root/.config/osc/oscrc << FEOF3 [general] apiurl=http://117.78.1.88 no_verify=1
[http://117.78.1.88] user=$OBS_USER pass=$OBS_PASSWD FEOF3
# check.config sed -i "s#yum_repo=.*#yum_repo=/root/check_pkg_install_uninstall_function_service/update-release.repo#g" /root/check_pkg_install_uninstall_function_service//check.config sed -i "s#obs_repo=.*#obs_repo=standard_x86_64#g" /root/check_pkg_install_uninstall_function_service/check.config sed -i "s#obs_arch=.*#obs_arch=x86_64#g" /root/check_pkg_install_uninstall_function_service/check.config
# yum repo > /root/check_pkg_install_uninstall_function_service/update-release.repo cat > /root/check_pkg_install_uninstall_function_service/update-release.repo << FEOF4 [OS] name=OS baseurl=https://repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP1/OS/x86_64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[everything] name=everything baseurl=https://repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP1/everything/x86_64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[epol] name=epol baseurl=https://repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP1/EPOL/x86_64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[update] name=update baseurl=https://repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP1/update/x86_64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[update-epol] name=update-epol baseurl=https://repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP1/EPOL/update/x86_64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[update_20210630] name=update_20210630 baseurl=http://121.36.84.172/repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP1/update_20210630/x86_64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[update_20210630-epol] name=update_20210630-epol baseurl=http://121.36.84.172/repo.openeuler.org/openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP1/EPOL/update_20210630/x86_64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0 FEOF4
#touch ~/.oscrc #cat > ~/.oscrc << FEOF2 #[general] #apiurl = http://117.78.1.88 #[http://117.78.1.88] #user = $OBS_USER #pass = $OBS_PASSWD #FEOF2
#osc ls
#exit 0
cat /root/.config/osc/oscrc
sed -i 's/\/etc\/pkgship-tools\/check.config/.\/check.config/g' check_pkg_basic_usage.sh
dnf install osc -y bash check_pkg_basic_usage.sh -iu --without-docker -p openEuler:20.03:LTS:SP1 -l pkglist
EOF
